portfolio

Type: object

Definition for PACTA portfolio object

 No Additional Properties

root files
Type: array of string

List of portfolio files to be analyzed.

 No Additional Items

Each item of this array must be:

root files files items
Type: string

Path to the file.

root holdingsDate
Type: enum (of string)Format: date

Date of the holdings data.

Must be one of:

  • "2022-12-31"
  • "2023-12-31"

root name
Type: string

Name of the portfolio.
